snippet: Officials said the fighting in Aswan Province erupted over the harassment of a girl, and students from the two sides later sprayed offensive graffiti at a local school.
lead_paragraph: Officials said the fighting in Aswan Province erupted over the harassment of a girl, and students from the two sides later sprayed offensive graffiti at a local school.

headline.main: Clan Fighting in Egypt Kills at Least 23
headline.print_headline: Clan Fighting in Egypt Kills at Least 23
